title: Middle East Crisis: Live Updates: Israel Launches Strikes Against Hundreds of Hezbollah Targets
content: An Israeli military spokesman said that Israel had attacked hundreds of rocket launchers in southern Lebanon, and that Hezbollah fired 90 rockets into Israel. The death toll of an Israeli strike in Beirut rose to 37, Lebanese authorities said.
summary: An Israeli military spokesman said that Israel had attacked hundreds of rocket launchers in southern Lebanon, and that Hezbollah fired 90 rockets into Israel. The death toll of an Israeli strike in Beirut rose to 37, Lebanese authorities said.

title: How a U.S. Ally Uses Aid as a Cover in War
content: The United Arab Emirates is expanding a covert campaign to back a winner in Sudan’s civil war. Waving the banner of the Red Crescent, it is also smuggling weapons and deploying drones.
summary: The United Arab Emirates is expanding a covert campaign to back a winner in Sudan’s civil war. Waving the banner of the Red Crescent, it is also smuggling weapons and deploying drones.

title: Albania Plans to Create a Muslim State in Tirana as Symbol of Tolerance

title: Elon Musk’s X Backs Down in Brazil
